title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Saturday, September 30 (game #614)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: iCloud gets a makeover with a revamped look and quality-of-life upgrades
description: An iCloud update has added new tools to the quick-glance widgets and it's now easier to control information.

title: Pixel Watch 2 could get some Fitbit-style features to measure your stress levels
description: Recent leaks claim the Pixel Watch 2 will adopt some tech from the Fitbit Sense 2 and may have a new EDA sensor to power it.

title: Elon Musk has removed a vital feature on X – fake news could soon get a lot worse
description: A tool to help users of X (formerly Twitter) report political misinformation has been removed – and that's just the start.

title: How to watch the Google Pixel 8 launch – stream the Made by Google event live
description: A Made by Google event for the new Pixel 8, Pixel 8 Pro, and Pixel Watch 2 will be streamed live on October 4 from New York City.

title: Yes, obviously Diablo 4 will receive quality-of-life improvements at the start and throughout season two
description: Blizzard has confirmed that Diablo 4 will receive quality-of-life improvements throughout season two.

title: Booking.com customers targeted in major new phishing campaign
description: Booking.com hotel accounts used in elaborate phishing schemes aimed at stealing people’s money.

title: Bing AI chat messages are being hijacked by ads pushing malware
description: Be careful when clicking sponsored links recommended by Bing.

title: Proton builds its very own privacy-first CAPTCHA system
description: The cybersecurity firm describes it as "the world's first" censorship-resistant CAPTCHA that can access its VPN and email where blocked. Here's all you need to know.

title: Cyberpunk 2077 update 2.01 is coming soon with a save file corruption fix for PS5
description: CD Projekt Red has announced that Cyberpunk 2077 patch 2.01 is "coming soon" and will mainly address performance issues and bugs.

title: Chinese hackers stole 60,000 US government emails in Microsoft breach
description: More details about Storm-0558’s spring attack against the State Department emerge.

title: Starfield was intentionally made to be played for years, says Todd Howard
description: Starfield director Todd Howard says that Bethesda's sci-fi RPG was "intentionally" designed to be played for a long time.

title: How good is the ANC in Bowers & Wilkins' luxe headphones? I wore them at a live gig to find out
description: To mark the release of the new burgundy Bowers & Wilkins PX8 headphones, I got try them at a James Blake gig.

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Max, Prime Video and more this weekend (September 29)
description: From highly anticipated superhero spin-offs to new Netflix thrillers, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: The makers of MOVEit have patched another major security flaw
description: The WS_FTP Server product was found to be vulnerable in multiple ways, with two flaws being labeled as critical.

title: Sony's cheapest OLED TV is now available – here's what you're getting for your money
description: The A75L is Sony’s entry-level OLED in its 2023 TV range and provides just as good specs as the Sony A80L, but will we see big discounts on Black Friday for it?

title: Roll the credits: Netflix is sending out its final DVD rental discs today
description: This is how Netflix started, a long, long time back – a quarter of a century ago, in fact.

title: The annual Golden Joystick Awards are coming up, and here's what you can vote on
description: The 41st Golden Joystick Awards are coming up powered by Intel, and it just released the shortlist.

title: Amazon wants to offer your business a whole host of generative AI models for AWS
description: AWS looks to gear up towards the future of AI.

title: The wait is finally over - AMD FSR 3 is launching tomorrow
description: AMD FSR3 is officially debuting tomorrow - 11 months after its initial announcement.

title: Been putting off that free Windows 11 or 10 upgrade? Windows 7 and 8 diehards need to move fast
description: The free upgrade loophole that has been in place for pretty much forever is now being closed by Microsoft.

title: You can now get a cheaper AMC Plus subscription but you’ll have to put up with ads
description: If you don't mind advertising, AMC has just massively cut the cost of its streaming service and you can save on the ad-free version if you pay annually.

title: Cyberpunk 2077's rough launch didn't deter CD Projekt Red from moving forward to make the game better, says director
description: CD Projekt Red never thought about quitting development on Cyberpunk 2077 despite its disastrous launch.

title: Another leak suggests Nvidia’s RTX 5090 could be a stupidly powerful GPU
description: Yet more from the rumor mill about how Nvidia’s next-gen flagship could be a stormer of a graphics card.

title: LG’s 2024 OLED TVs could get a serious jump in picture quality thanks to a next-gen chip
description: Planning to buy a state of the art OLED TV? LG's 2024 OLEDs could be the TVs you've been waiting for.

title: The iPhone SE 4 could be an affordable iPhone 14 with an Action button
description: Fresh iPhone SE rumors have suggested that the next version of the affordable phone will be based on the iPhone 14.

title: Leaked Samsung Galaxy S24 renders tease iPhone 15 Pro-style frame
description: New renders have seemingly revealed the design of the Samsung Galaxy S24.

title: Sony has hidden the KOTOR Remake trailer sparking even more cancelation rumors
description: Sony has removed the Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic Remake trailer and deleted the game's initial announcements posts.

title: The UK government is telling people to stop using Excel spreadsheets because of multiple data breaches
description: Spreadsheets used to share freedom of information requests are being distributed with personal information unredacted.

title: The Meta Quest 3 will get a much-needed body-tracking update soon
description: Body-tracking and improved VR legs are coming to the Meta Quest 3 before the end of the year.

title: Nvidia office reportedly raided over cloud dominance inquiry
description: French competition authority raids Nvidia office following concerns about anticompetitive practices.

title: Netflix’s new mystery thriller movie is being slammed by critics – watch these 3 instead
description: Netflix's latest crime thriller film is being panned by critics, but you still might like what's on offer.

title: Spotify will now automatically transcribe your favorite podcasts as you listen
description: The latest new feature being pushed out to the Spotify app means that you'll get text alongside your audio.

title: Phishing scam pretends to be the Red Cross to trick victims into installing malware
description: Fake Red Cross blood donation emails look to deploy new trojans among the victims.

title: Bad news - your Microsoft Teams calls are about to get a whole lot more interactive
description: Transform your Microsoft Teams call into an immersive, 3D experience, if you want.

title: Hybrid working is still causing a lot of headaches for IT admins
description: Companies aren’t handling remote device cybersecurity adequate, and HP is calling for a change to device management.

title: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 accessibility features include support for PS5 Access controller
description: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 will have PS5 Access controller support.

title: GoDaddy is making it easier to migrate your website from WordPress
description: Free do-it-yourself migration tool - or paid, managed version - makes moving your hosted WordPress site to GoDaddy easier.

title: Max Payne remakes are going to be a huge undertaking, according to Remedy
description: The original voice actor for Max Payne, Sam Lake, says that the remakes are a 'significant undertaking'.

title: Mojang has confirmed that Minecraft Dungeons' 1.17 update is its last, and the team has "moved on to new projects"
description: It's been confirmed that update 1.17 is Minecraft Dungeons' final, and no further content will roll out for the game.

title: Ryder Cup 2023 live stream: players, schedule and how to watch golf online, what TV channel
description: Can Team Europe secure a victory over Team USA on hoe soil in Rome? Make sure you don't miss any of the action with our guide to watching 2023 Ryder Cup live streams.

title: New ChromeOS update for Chromebooks makes it feel more like Android
description: Google is introducing Material You to Chromebooks for a more stylish, dynamic look.
